classification.1: Metro - Counties in metro areas of 1 million population or more
classification.2: Metro - Counties in metro areas of 250,000 to 1 million population
classification.3: Metro - Counties in metro areas of fewer than 250,000 population
classification.4: Nonmetro - Urban population of 20,000 or more, adjacent to a metro area
classification.5: Nonmetro - Urban population of 20,000 or more, not adjacent to a metro area
classification.6: Nonmetro - Urban population of 2,500 to 19,999, adjacent to a metro area
classification.7: Nonmetro - Urban population of 2,500 to 19,999, not adjacent to a metro area
classification.8: Nonmetro - Completely rural or less than 2,500 urban population, adjacent to a metro area
classification.9: Nonmetro - Completely rural or less than 2,500 urban population, not adjacent to a metro area
